attributes.title: Very Difficult to Log In
attributes.review: I wanted to keep up with our President but it was impossible to sign in! Trump has not done all the things he said he would and with his reaction to Covid, I am disappointed. I love our country but it is a mess right now. I could not sign in to the app even after I created a completely new account. It sounds like others are having similar problems. There are a lot of very bad one star reviews and they might just be satire, but trust me the app is a waste of time. If you want to keep up with Trump his tweets app is really helpful!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!
attributes.review: I was a trump supporter less than four months ago. Now it is safe to say that I absolutely despise Trump and his app. This app has created so many bugs in my iPhone and my iPhone will never be the same since I downloaded this app. I very much regret this downloading this app and I definitely would not recommend downloading and I am also pretty sure that he purposely created this app with bugs and viruses to mess up our phones. If I could get this app a -5 rating I would, trust me. So many issues with this app, so let me give you a tip to not support trump ever!!!!
